name: Spaceship
victoryScreenHeader: Build the Spaceship to travel to arnother Arks
victoryString:
Your masterpiece is complete! You've successfully assembled all the critical parts and built an extraordinary spaceship. The stars are now your playground. With unwavering determination and brilliant ingenuity, you've forged a vessel ready to explore the cosmos.

Prepare for launch and let the adventure begin!!

name: Boss
victoryScreenHeader: Defeat the Overseer on the Tek Era, and use his essence to build the Ascension
victoryString:
With the defeat of the Overseer, you have proven your strength, courage, and resilience. Your journey across the ARK has led you through countless challenges and perilous encounters, but you have emerged victorious. The Overseer has fallen, and with it, the mysteries of the ARK begin to unfold.

You have unlocked the secrets of this artificial world, revealing the true purpose of your existence here. As you step forward into the unknown, you carry with you the knowledge and power to shape the future of this land.
